name: Project Descended
description:
WARNING: Game may not be suitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

NOTE: Don't forget to check the Info button, this game can be confusing for begginers.

Rumors of a mythical organization still spreads out to this day, in real life and in the internet. All we know is that they are a secret organization that keeps things in the shadows, never to be seen, never to touch the surface of the earth. 

You were surfing the deep dark web for the fun of it, just to entertain yourself and see what’s up, until you receive a notification. You find out you were a lucky individual chosen to discover and find out about the mysterious organization that was being talked about in the internet. You are chosen as a candidate to try out some experiments inside this organization, all that you’re told is that you will be rewarded with a huge amount of income, much more than you will ever earn in your entire lifetime. Seeing how bored you were and doubting the legitimacy of the notification, you proceeded and followed the notification. 

Several days later, you were invited to the secret location and taken in a vehicle. You safely got in the destination. The people inside the vehicle inform you that they have taken you to Area 51. Things proceed from here.

You are given a project. You will be a test subject for their “entities” that they contain inside the organization. You will be tested with your scavenging and detective skills. The entity that you will be experimented on is an entire location. Two locations specifically. As a candidate for this experiment, you will be locked inside an abandoned house (first location) which is a home to a haunted entity. You will be provided tools that you will use to find clues around the place of any paranormal activity. You must capture 1 clear evidence with each tool provided, while avoiding any contact with the haunted entity, to ensure your safety, but also granted access to escape the location. Only then you will access the second location. 

Will you somehow escape this inescapable fate? Or will you face an impending doom? Only your actions will tell

This is a group project for our school, everyone can download it and test it out for free.

By: Super Idol Team

Update 1: Update the UI.
